Welcome to PSD-Analyser's documentation!
========================================

**PSD-Analyser** is a Python library for examining and manipulating
particle size distributions (PSDs)

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   readme.md
   equations.md
